TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: It's you, friend! I feel better but everything is different now, I can't explain this... even for myself.
SOLANUM: I'm here, right? But how I am here? I thought about Timber Hearth and here am I...
SOLANUM: So.. Nomai are dead? All of them? It's really sad to know.. how much time has passed? Last thing I remember is that Bells guided me on Quantum Moon pilgrimage like it was an hour ago.

SOLANUM: And I never saw the other race ever. You guys have four eyes? That's weird. I... I have to apologize on behalf of the clan.. We tried to explode the Sun once and it would turn your race to ashes... This is unacceptable, but I'm happy we failed. I mean I can't not say this, while I observing the young, curiois race.
SOLANUM: You saw that Orbital Probe Cannon? Is it.. broken? I need to check it's Control Module. Find me there.
